Call this webservice : Enter the webservice endpoint to call if an error occurs. e.g
http://servername:77/services/logerrors?error=[[ErrorMessage]]

End Workflow : Checked - Will end workflow if an error occured. Leave it unchecked if you want the workflow to continue."
